Apple_rust_leaf_00008.jpg.text: The leaf is green with yellow spots scattered across it. The spots are irregular in shape and vary in size. The leaf has a smooth texture, and the edges appear to be serrated. There are no visible damages, and the veins are not distinctly visible.

Apple_rust_leaf_00003.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a few yellow spots scattered across it. The leaf has a somewhat oval shape with serrated edges. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. There are no visible damages, holes, or tears on the leaf.

Apple_rust_leaf_00004.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a slightly veined texture. It has a somewhat oval shape with serrated edges. There are several yellowish spots scattered across the leaf, with some being larger and more concentrated in certain areas. The petiole appears to be thin and green.
